rainfalls:
Rainfall Advisory No. 10 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 5:00 PM, 12 June 2025(Thursday)



Light to moderate rains are expected over Metro Manila, Quezon and Nueva Ecija.



Light to moderate rains affecting Zambales, Bataan, Bulacan(Hagonoy, Paombong, Malolos, Bulakan, Meycauayan, Obando, Marilao, Bocaue, Balagtas, Guiguinto), Tarlac(San Clemente, Mayantoc, San Jose, Capas, Bamban) and Pampanga(Porac, Floridablanca, Lubao, Macabebe, Sasmuan, Masantol) and may affect nearby areas.



The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 8:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
